Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


The Dragon:

     He knew that Galvatron had also come to this planet seeking to destroy Megatron, so armed with this knowledge, he did a planet wide search for Galvatron's base. Once he found it, he transformed to beast mode and took off towards it, he wasn't far away and it wouldn't take him long at all to reach the base. In fact, he would reach it before Cygnar and the others.



---------------------------------
